## DisjointSet.union() method

Connects combines the trees of the given two node IDs and returns the new resulting canonical tree root ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
union(a: number, b: number): number;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>number</code> |  |
|  b | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
